item.title: My first lightmap baker: Bakery
item.description: A simple Sponza Palace baked by my first lightmap baker. Only one directional light setup in the scene. Looking pretty rough. It’s been a couple of years. Since I started making my own lightmap baker. And before I start this article, I finished this project. Although I need a lot of things to do: such as optimization, complete some minor features and fix many bugs… But now I’m planning to make a Mark.

item.title: About me
item.description: Hello traveler! Thank you for visiting my blog. I’m working on a game development industry. So most of my posts will be related to programming stuff. Particularly in rendering. And since I’m not a good English speaker, some of(actually many of) articles will be awkward to read. But I will try my best to write it makes sense. And always welcome to point out of a wrong explanation or suggest a better expression.
